name: Smash Bro
description:
SMASH, BRO!

Smash and destroy everything in your path!

The Ultra Flex Edition was has been developed to help future prosthetic users train their limbs to use their prosthetic limb in created by Limbitless Solutions.

--------------------------------

Level-Up Game Jam UCF Feb 2016

Zackary Henderson - Code

Amanda Simmons - Code and Sound

Melissa Scharf - Art
